text: Lamine Ghezali (born 6 July 1999) is a French professional footballer who plays as a winger for SC Lyon on loan from Saint-Étienne. ==Club career== Ghezali is a youth exponent from Saint-Étienne. He made his Ligue 1 debut on 23 April 2017 against Stade Rennais.
